echo.message: FlyMine build file - available targets are:

target.name: create-production-model
target.depends: remove-genomic, prepare-build-model, merge-psi-model, merge-rnai-model, merge-ensembl-model, merge-phenotype-model, merge-go-model, merge-uniprot-model, merge-protein_structure-model, merge-so-model, merge-orthologue-model, merge-flyreg-model, merge-tiling_path-model, merge-long_oligo-model, merge-chado-model, merge-homophila-model, merge-interpro-model, merge-bdgp_clone-model, merge-drosdel-model, merge-shortcuts

target.name: jar-genomic
target.description: create a jar of the genomic model

target.name: production-build
target.depends: create-production-model, compile-genomic-model, jar-genomic, build-db-production, create-indexes-production, load-static-flymine, build-flybase-production, read-flybase-chromosome-fasta, build-ensembl-anopheles-production, build-uniprot-production, build-rnai-production, build-homophila-production, build-psi-production, build-orthologues-production, build-phenotype-production, build-go-production, build-protein_structure-production, analyse-db-production, grant-db-production

target.name: test-models-inc

target.name: fulltest
target.depends: clean, compile-genomic-model, build-db-genomic-test, create-indexes-genomic-test, test-models-inc, genomic-test, test-flymine-java
target.description: do an incremental test and fail if there are any errors

fail.message: Some files violate FlyMine coding standards

target.name: test-report
target.description: generate a test report for all the unit tests

target.name: checkstyle
target.description: checks the coding style of all the java files in the project

target.name: release-webapp
target.description: release the webapp to the server

target.name: remove-webapp
target.description: remove the webapp from the server

target.name: release-webservice
target.description: release the webservice to the server

target.name: install-gbrowse-conf
target.description: copy the FlyMine/GBrowse configuration file to the gbrowse.conf directory

target.name: load-gbrowse-data
target.description: call bp_load_gff.pl to load the FlyMine GFF dump into GBrowse

target.name: load-gbrowse-data-mysql
target.description: call bp_bulk_load_gff.pl to load the FlyMine GFF dump into GBrowse

target.name: dist-javadoc
target.description: makes the javadoc available for distribution

target.name: clean-code
target.description: clean up all generated and compiled code
